name: sam4ritan
body:
###`WHOAMI`
I am sam4ritan. 

Obviously.

###What do I do?
I code from time to time. More often scripts than other stuff. I do maintain some java/android-based projects and some simple webdesign (which i do not really like), but mostly i create scripts for stress-testing and similar tasks. The latter are not here, on GitHub, but on GitLab, because i do not want them to fall into the hands of some scriptkiddie, only to blow up in their face and fry their hardware.

Additionally, i tend to know my way around with Linux.

###Why am I telling you this?
Counterquestion: Why are you reading this?

If you want my help with a project, feel free to contact me over GitHub, GitLab or Twitter(@sam4ritan).
If you want one of my pen-testing scripts, contact me, but proove that you can handle them. Tell me exactly, what you want to do and show me you can understand how this stuff works.

I will try to be a good samaritan, but i cannot guarantee it.

If you want a cookie, go to Ben's Cookies in Oxford, UK. They're the best ones out there and come at surprisingly low cost.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
